templateDef.name: Access Key ID
templateDef.desc: Enter the IAM access key ID.

templateDef.name: Secret Access Key
templateDef.desc: Enter the IAM user secret access key.

templateDef.name: AWS Region
templateDef.desc: Enter the region for your SQS queues.

templateDef.name: AWS Account ID
templateDef.desc: Enter the AQS account ID that owns the SQS queues.

templateDef.name: SQS MO Queue Name
templateDef.desc: Enter the name of your MO Queue.

templateDef.name: SQS MT Queue Name
templateDef.desc: Enter the name of your MT Queue.

templateDef.name: SQS MT Confirmation Queue Name
templateDef.desc: Enter the name of your MT Confirmation Queue.

templateDef.name: SQS MT Error Queue Name
templateDef.desc: Enter the name of your MT Error Queue.

triggers.name: Iridium - Receive MO
Iridium - Receive MT Confirmation
triggers.def:
var obj = Object.assign({}, event.data.body)
switch(event.data.body.mt_message_status) {
    case 0:
        obj.status = 'Successful, no payload in message'
        break
    case -1:
        obj.status = 'Invalid IMEI – too few characters, non-numeric characters'
        break
    case -2:
        obj.status = 'Unknown IMEI – not provisioned on the Iridium Gateway'
        break
    case -3:
        obj.status = 'Payload size exceeded maximum allowed (See Section 1.0)'
        break
    case -4:
        obj.status = 'Payload expected, but none received'
        break
    case -5:
        obj.status = 'MT message queue full (max of 50)'
        break
    case -6:
        obj.status = 'MT resources unavailable'
        break
    case -7:
        obj.status = 'Violation of MT DirectIP protocol error'
        break
    case -8:
        obj.status = 'Ring alerts to the given IMEI are disabled'
        break
    case -9:
        obj.status = 'The given IMEI is not attached (not set to receive ring alerts)'
        break
    case -10:
        obj.status = 'Source IP address rejected by MT filter'
        break
    case -11:
        obj.status = 'MTMSN value is out of range (valid range is 1 – 65,535)'
        break
    default:
        obj.status = 'Successful'
        obj.order = event.data.body.mt_message_status
        break
}

exec.now('iridium-mt-confirmation', obj)

triggers.name: Iridium - Receive MT Error
triggers.def:
var obj = Object.assign({}, event.data.body)
switch(event.data.body.mt_message_status) {
    case 0:
        obj.status = 'Successful, no payload in message'
        break
    case -1:

    case -2:

        break
    case -3:

        break
    case -4:
        obj.status = 'Payload expected, but none received'
        break
    case -5:

        break
    case -6:

        break
    case -7:

    case -9:

        break
    default:
        obj.status = 'Successful'
        obj.order = event.data.body.mt_message_status

exec.now('iridium-mt-error', obj)

triggers.name: Iridium - Send MT Message
Iridium - Receive MO to Track
